predicate.note: Frames file for 'perk' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to gain or regain energy or liveliness

example.name: transitive
example.text: But Mr. Rey brought about a merger in the next few years between the country 's major producers ; the increased efficiency has perked up the industry .

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Margins in the fiscal fourth quarter perked up , [*-1] rising to 51 % from 49.2 % a year earlier .
example.arg: [*-1] rising to 51 % from 49.2 % a year earlier
